text: The New York City Housing Authority Police Department was a police unit in New York City that existed from 1952 to 1995. The Housing Police, as well as New York City Transit Police, became part of the New York City Police Department in 1995 by order of New York City Mayor Rudolph W. Giuliani and is now called the Housing Bureau. ==Related pages== *New York City Transit Police *Color of the day (police) ==Other websites== *NYPD Homepage Category:Law enforcement in New York City Category:Law enforcement agencies of the United States Category:1952 establishments in the United States Category:1950s establishments in New York (state) Category:1995 disestablishments in the United States Category:1990s disestablishments in New York (state)
title: New York City Housing Authority Police Department
